titles.title: Alternative Vehicle Incentive Act of 2006
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the credit for certain alternative motor vehicles assembled in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/27/2006--Introduced. Alternative Vehicle Incentive Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase by $5,000 the tax credit for fuel cell, advanced lean burn technology, hybrid, and alternative fuel motor vehicles which are assembled in the United States. Repeals limitations on the number of hybrid and advanced lean burn technology motor vehicles eligible for the tax credit.
